title: Andrew Johnson National Historic Site: Eating & Sleeping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping       Eating: There are a variety of eating places within walking and driving distance of the site. Visit the Greene County Partnership's website for a list of nearby eating places. Sleeping: There are a variety of places to stay in the area. Hotels, motels, cabins, the historic General Morgan Inn, and bed and breakfasts are available nearby. Visit the Greene County Partnership's website for a list of accomodations.
